content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
-------------------
No permanent new structures have been successfully placed on the map. The agent made several attempts to supply a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5) for Automation Science Packs research but never completed its placement due to inventory and crafting-chain issues. Although operations made use of existing smelting furnaces (an iron furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) and a copper furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)) for resource production, no new structure was constructed by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
----------
• API Parameter Errors – When calling get_entities, use the correct signature. Avoid passing unexpected keywords (such as ‘radius’) or extra positional arguments. Also, check that the returned value is iterable before using it.
• Placement Failures – Verify that the required item (e.g. Lab) is present in inventory prior to attempting placement. Ensure the target tile is correctly validated for placement.
• Crafting Chain Shortfalls – Before attempting to craft complex items like the Lab, confirm that all sub-ingredients (iron-gear-wheel, electronic-circuit, copper-cable, etc.) are producible with available machines or processes. This avoids failures from missing or uncraftable dependencies.
• None Handling – Ensure that functions expected to return collections (such as get_entities) do not yield None. If they do, fall back to an empty list rather than iterating directly.
